Action.author: shitaibin
Action.body: Can I take this task. And is there more detailed information for me to finish it?

Action.author: shitaibin
Action.body: ~btl5037 Can I take this task. And is there more detailed information for me to finish it?

Action.author: btl5037
Action.body: ~shitaibin , sorry, I missed your previous comment. Can you ping me on RocketChat sometime this week and we can discuss it. I'd love to see someone from the community work on this. This has been superseded by a different Jira which is encompassing a major rewrite I am actively working on, but I'd be more than happy to let someone pick up that part of it.
